function_description: Navigate through lists using hand icon
initial_state: User is on a board with multiple lists, some of which are not visible due to window size.
steps: Hover over an empty space on the board to see the hand icon.
Click and hold the mouse button when the hand icon appears.
Drag the mouse left or right to move across the lists.
expected_state: The view shifts horizontally, allowing the user to see lists that were previously out of view.
